aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.desc: Hi, I’m Erick, a front-end developer from Brazil.
aboutMe.desc2: I’m passionate about creating beautiful and functional web and mobile applications using modern technologies such as React, React Native, TypeScript, NextJS and NodeJS. I’m also a student of Information Technology, expected to graduate in 2024.
aboutMe.desc3: I’m looking for new opportunities to work on challenging and exciting projects that can make a positive impact on people’s lives.
